title: Extreme Lag as soon as I get into League Game (Only of League)
body: Soooo before anyone comes in here saying it's my internet, you are wrong, I play hundreds of other games with no lag what so ever, playing for days on end, and now as soon as I open league of legends up and que into a game, immediate 3k ping plus. So this is not an issue with my internet at all, everything is fine, only as soon as I get into a game, not even in the champion lobby, I have tested multiple times in customs and still same thing. 50 ping constant and then as soon as the game loads up 3k Ping plus. I have tried repairing league and has not done anything, so if anyone has a sollution or can tell me why this is happening, would be great, because league is unplayable. Thanks

replies.body:
EDIT: If you are playing from NZ this is likely your issue:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/WvuaHG1z-2018-03-21-nz-players-increased-latency
___

It is most likely your internet, just specifically the connection from you to League, rather than your connection to everything.

Your issue is a bit more aggressive than most I've seen, and connection issues aren't something I'm particularly well versed in, so I would recommend this:

1. Run a **trace route** to the OCE server (Start menu > type "cmd" > Open the command prompt > type "tracert 103.240.227.5"). The server itself won't respond (you'll start getting no responses), but it should give a clear idea of where that ping is coming from, especially if it's consistent. ~~
2. Screenshot the trace route and submit it in a ticket to **Player Support** (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
